content.rendered:
Directed by Anthony D’Souza.

Written by Aditi Mediratta.

Cast Emraan Hashmi(Mohammad Azharuddin). Nargis Fakhri(Sangeeta Bijlani). Prachi Desai(Naureen). Lara Dutta(Meera Verma). Kunaal Roy Kapur(Reddy). Gautam Gulati(Ravi). Sammy Jonas Heaney(Kid no.4 (as Sammy John Heaney)). Shweta Kawatra(News editor). Mohit Chhabra(Sachin). Anikie Maguire(Racecourse Spectator). Kulbhushan Kharbanda(Nanujaan). Rajesh Sharma(M.K Sharma). Hemant Choudhary(Ad film director (as Hemant Chaudhary)). Shernaz Patel(Azhar’s Mom). Veerendra Saxena(Azhar’s Dad) . Nausheen Ahmed(Reporter 1). Saunvedan Aparanti(Anirudh). Claire Ashton(VIP Party Guest). Varun Badola(Kapil Dev). Gurpal Bhogal(CID Police). Paul Blackwell(Cricket fan). Raaf Chaudhary(Raaf). Ankur Chopra(Bonnie the Gym Owner). Roy Christian(Cricketer). Vikki Edwards(Guest in Royal Enclosure). Daniel Eghan(Racecourse Businessman). Sandeep Garcha(Yasnaam). Ashish Gole(Junior Reporter). Apurva Gondalia(Sourav Ganguly). Naman Gupta(Racecourse Businessman). Rameez Hassan(Guest at party).

Languages Hindi. Urdu.

Producers Tanveer Bookwala. Ashwani Chopra. Anjali D’Cunha. Aman Gill. Bill Hayes. Shoaib Ibrahim. Sameer Qasim Isa. Kasia Kaczmarek. Ekta Kapoor. Shobha Kapoor. Firuzi Khan. Pranjal Khandhdiya. Farid Malick. Sameer Nair. Chirag Nihalani. Sakett Saawhney. Karishma Naina Sharma.

Production Indo-UK Film Company. Jhakaas.
